generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, typical of a street or highway.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, bordered by trees and a statue, and on the right side, adjacent to parked cars.
- building: A building with scaffolding covered in white sheeting is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green and yellow leaves line both sides of the road, indicating vegetation.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast and gray.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road.
- bus: A yellow bus is visible in the distance, traveling in the opposite direction.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including directional signs and a green sign indicating "228" and "Albstadt".
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole above the road, near the center of the image.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
